message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This research analyzes the relationship between child nutrition indicators and agricultural productivity in Ethiopia, drawing on data from both the Ethiopia Socioeconomic Survey and the Ethiopian Rural Household Survey.", "dataset": ["Ethiopia Socioeconomic Survey", "Ethiopian Rural Household Survey"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Nutrition"]}, {"sentence": "We explore the determinants of air pollution levels across Chinese cities using two datasets: the China City Statistical Yearbook and the National Bureau of Statistics Urban Household Survey.", "dataset": ["China City Statistical Yearbook", "National Bureau of Statistics Urban Household Survey"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "This article investigates how social protection policies can reduce income inequality, utilizing data from both the World Income Inequality Database and the Demographic and Health Surveys within a panel dataset framework.", "dataset": ["World Income Inequality Database", "Demographic and Health Surveys"], "topic": ["Inequality and Shared Prosperity", "Social Protection"]}, {"sentence": "We evaluate infrastructure projects in three African countries using a comprehensive dataset comprising loan-level data from the China Development Bank, the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, and the Export-Import Bank of China.", "dataset": ["China Development Bank", "Industrial and Commercial Bank of China", "Export-Import Bank of China"], "topic": ["Infrastructure"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the economic effects of climate change in Bangladesh by analyzing data from both the Household Income and Expenditure Survey and the Bangladesh Climate Change Knowledge Management Center's database on natural disasters.", "dataset": ["Household Income and Expenditure Survey", "Bangladesh Climate Change Knowledge Management Center's database on natural disasters"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We investigate the relationship between financial inclusion and gender inequality using data from both the World Bank's Global Findex database and the Gender Data Portal.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Global Findex database", "Gender Data Portal"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Gender"]}, {"sentence": "This study analyzes the impact of extractive industries on local communities in Latin America using data from both the Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative and the Living Standards Measurement Survey.", "dataset": ["Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative", "Living Standards Measurement Survey"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We assess the impact of expanding regional integration through cross-border investment using data from both the World Investment Report and the Economic Community of West African States Trade Liberalization Scheme.", "dataset": ["World Investment Report", "Economic Community of West African States Trade Liberalization Scheme"], "topic": ["Regional Integration", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To estimate the impacts of digital development on economic growth, we use data from both the World Development Indicators and the Global Information Technology Report.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators", "Global Information Technology Report"], "topic": ["Digital Development", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the relationship between governance and disaster risk management by analyzing data from both the Worldwide Governance Indicators and the United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction.", "dataset": ["Worldwide Governance Indicators", "United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction"], "topic": ["Governance", "Disaster Risk Management"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "This research analyzes the relationship between child nutrition indicators and agricultural productivity in Ethiopia, drawing on data from both the Ethiopia Socioeconomic Measurement Survey"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We assess the impact of expanding regional integration through cross-border investment using data from both the World Investment Report and the Economic Community of West African States Trade Liberalization Scheme.", "dataset": ["World Investment Report", "Economic Community of West African States Trade Liberalization Scheme"], "topic": ["Regional Integration", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To estimate the impacts of digital development on economic growth, we use data from both the World Development Indicators and the Global Information Technology Report.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators", "Global Information Technology Report"], "topic": ["Digital Development", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the relationship between governance and disaster risk management by analyzing data from both the Worldwide Governance Indicators and the United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction.", "dataset": ["Worldwide Governance Indicators", "United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction"], "topic": ["Governance", "Disaster Risk Management"]}]
